credit_line: Gift of Denis Gallion and Daniel Morris
title: California Peach
description: Standing cup with a tall foot constructed of triangular and rectangular slabs, each triangle pierced with a circular hole.  Foot surmounted by a cup in the form of a 1/2 peach with small pit-like projection on one side and abstract 'handle' constructed of triangles and other smaller geometric shapes opposite. Glazed overall in shades of yellow, green, biege, and pink.
name: Cup
